generic.notNullOrUndefined: {label} must not be null or undefined
generic.primitive: {label} must be a primitive value, but was {actualType}

object.allOfButXOfPaths: {label} must contain all but {count} of these paths: {paths}
object.maxKeyCountRecursive: {label} must have at most {maxKeyCount} recursive keys
object.minDepth: {label} is not deep enough. Minimum depth: {minDepth}
object.minKeyCountRecursive: {label} must have at least {minKeyCount} recursive keys
object.noneOfPaths: {label} cannot contain any of these paths: {paths}
object.pathsOtherThan: {label} contains paths that are not allowed: {paths}
object.someOfPaths: {label} must contain at least one of these paths: {paths}
object.xOfPaths: {label} must contain exactly {count} of these paths: {paths}

array.allOf: {label} must contain all of these values: {requiredValues}. Missing: {missingValue}
array.length: {label} must have a length of {requiredLength}. Current length: {length}
array.lengthBetween: {label} must have a length between {min} and {max}. Current length: {length}
array.maxLength: {label} contains more than {max} items. Current length: {length}
array.minLength: {label} contains less than {min} items. Current length: {length}
array.noneOf: {label} cannot contain any of these values: {forbiddenValues}. Found {invalidValue} at index {index}
array.only: {label} can only contain values from: {allowedValues}. Invalid value {invalidValue} found at index {index}
array.otherThan: {label} cannot contain any of these values: {forbiddenValues}. Found {invalidValue} at index {index}
array.someOf: {label} must contain at least one of these values: {possibleValues}
array.tuple: {label} must match the tuple values: {tupleValues}. Expected {expectedValue} at index {index}, but found {invalidValue}
array.unique: {label} must contain only unique values. Duplicate value {duplicateValue} found at indices {index1} and {index2}

number.max: {label} must be less than or equal to {comparison}
number.min: {label} must be greater than or equal to {comparison}

string.alphanumeric: {label} must contain only letters and numbers
string.base64: {label} must be a valid Base64 encoded string
string.binary: {label} must contain only binary digits (0 and 1)
string.bmp: {label} must contain only Basic Multilingual Plane characters
string.creditCard: {label} must be a valid credit card number
string.currencyCode: {label} must be a valid ISO 4217 currency code
string.dataUrl: {label} must be a valid data URI
string.domain: {label} must be a valid domain name
string.e164: {label} must be a valid E164 phone number format
string.email: {label} must be a valid email address
string.gtin: {label} must be a valid GTIN (Global Trade Item Number)
string.hex: {label} must be a valid hexadecimal string
string.hexColor: {label} must be a valid hex color code
string.imei: {label} must be a valid IMEI number
string.ip: {label} must be a valid IP address (IPv4 or IPv6)
string.ipCidr: {label} must be a valid IP CIDR notation
string.ipCidrV4: {label} must be a valid IPv4 CIDR notation
string.ipCidrV6: {label} must be a valid IPv6 CIDR notation
string.ipV4: {label} must be a valid IPv4 address
string.ipV6: {label} must be a valid IPv6 address
string.jwt: {label} must be a valid JWT token
string.label: {label} must be a valid label (1-63 chars, alphanumeric and hyphens, no leading/trailing hyphens)
string.lengthBetween: {label} must have a length between {min} and {max}
string.mac: {label} must be a valid MAC address
string.maxLength: {label} must have a maximum length of {max}
string.maxWords: {label} must have a maximum of {max} words
string.measurement: {label} must be a valid measurement with units

complex.base: {label} must meet complexity requirements (length: {minLen}-{maxLen}, uppercase: {minUppercase}+, lowercase: {minLowercase}+, digits: {minDigits}+, special chars: {minSpecialChars}+)
complex.insufficientUppercase: {label} must contain at least {minUppercase} uppercase letter(s)
complex.insufficientLowercase: {label} must contain at least {minLowercase} lowercase letter(s)
complex.insufficientSpecialChars: {label} must contain at least {minSpecialChars} special character(s)
complex.excessiveRepetition: {label} cannot have more than {maxRepeats} consecutive identical characters

string.minLength: {label} must have a minimum length of {min}
string.minWords: {label} must have a minimum of {min} words
string.money: {label} must be a valid monetary amount

numeric.base: {label} must be a valid numeric string

string.path: {label} must be a valid file path
string.phone: {label} must be a valid phone number
string.repetition: {label} must be a repetition of '{fragment}' between {min} and {max} times
string.slug: {label} must be a valid slug (lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens)
string.ssn: {label} must be a valid Social Security Number
string.state: {label} must be a valid US state abbreviation
string.wordCount: {label} must have a word count of {count}

zip.base: {label} must be a valid ZIP code

date.dayOfWeek: {label} must be on day {dayOfWeek} of the week (0=Sunday, 6=Saturday)
date.human: {label} must be a valid non-ISO date format
date.iso: {label} must be a valid ISO 8601 date format
date.isoOrdinal: {label} must be a valid ISO ordinal date format (YYYY-DDD)
date.isoWeek: {label} must be a valid ISO week date format (YYYY-Www or YYYY-Www-D)
date.leapYear: {label} must be a date in a leap year
date.minAge: {label} must be at least {minAge} years old
